channel.title: iClarity V1 - Perfect PvP/NvP combat
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/9ao2v9.gif[/img]
Welcome to iClarity - The private server with the Old PKing brought back to life!
I've released this because I believe the Runescape Private Server community needs a new base to start with, and this is my contribution to that. I don't really mind if you use it or not.
iClarity is an 'old school' pking server. Which means NO shitty dragon claws; NO godswords; NO PvP armour. There are still items such as the Fighter's torso, defenders, void range etc. You can view all the item ID's for you spawn spawn with, [URL=http://"http://iclarity.ulmb.com/items.txt"]Here[/URL].
This is just a base at the moment: there is no economy, and you use commands to spawn items/get levels. You can disable level setting, as training is fully functional and can be used. However, I haven't added any sort of economy (Skills for items etc) yet.
You have to use my client with this server, otherwise if you use another client with this server/another server with this client, it will fuck up. If you want to enable my server/client to use with another server/client, PM me, and I will PM you back with a short tutorial.
This server is based off my Cleaned Czar. My client is based off the 317 deob. I have edited it A LOT.
Server download: http://uppit.com/v/L1MXZUH2 Mirror 1: http://www.MegaShare.com/1069349 Mirror 2: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=XNBA0U0F
Client download: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=4I8SFAXD
All of the sprite edits in my client are through the cache, to save hardcoding. The only exception to this is the 2 sprites for the equipment interface.
I also spent a lot of time on the client.
[u][b](¯`·._.· Features ·._.·´¯)[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Server is packaged and very easy to edit.[/li] [li]All classes are easy to access and find.[/li] [li]All files such as data files and config files are neatly tidied into separate folders in the 'bin' folder.[/li] [li]Perfect PvP and NvP combat.[/li] [li]Perfect following and combat following, working with range, melee, magic AND autocasting.[/li] [li]Fully working autocasting on players.[/li] [li]Perfect 1v1 areas with PvP combat.[/li] [li]Perfect attack and defence bonuses for melee, range and magic.[/li] [li]FULL PvP magic.[/li] [li]No NvP magic added yet.[/li] [li]Almost finished Barrows.[/li] [li]56 waves of the Tzhaar Fight cave.[/li] [li]Fully working headicons - loaded through the cache; not hardcoded.[/li] [li]Fully working Hint icon, which is used in dueling and NPC's who attack you such as the barrows brothers.[/li] [li]Almost finished dueling. Still some rules to finish off. Full staking, and most rules work.[/li] [li]Fully working wilderness levels; no shit PvP levels.[/li] [li]Projectiles follow you, or your projectiles follow the enemy - This works with both NPCs and Players.[/li] [li]Most special attacks added.[/li] [li]Perfect second hit mask - No timers for double hitting special attacks.[/li] [li]Perfect timers for magic. E.G. blitz has the delay between the GFX and the actual hit.[/li] [li]Some skills started on. These include cooking, thieving, fishing and herblore.[/li][/ul]
This is just the first version, and is unfinished. In the next version, there will be A LOT more to come, so keep your hopes up for the next version to be 10x as good :).
[u][b]Pictures:[/b][/u]
Dds Special attack:
[IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww4/primadude12/Ddsspecial.gif[/img]
Blitz:

[IMG]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww4/primadude12/jad.jpg[/img]
[u]Fight Cave - Half of the second-to-last wave, and the final wave - Tzok Jad[/u]
HQ - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sxZFroKTB6k&fmt=18]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sxZFroKTB6k&fmt=18[/url] LQ - [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sxZFroKTB6k]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sxZFroKTB6k[/url]

Enjoy :).

item.title: iClarity V1 - Perfect PvP/NvP combat
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Schmoopy Sir Schmoopy
item.description:
@Sir_Schmoopy wrote:

I know this kind of died, but just so you guys know… Prima is still developing this.

[quote=“prima, post:66, topic:283547”]Alright.

Things added/fixed so far:

Fixed bug: Magic tabs.
Fixed bug: You couldn’t see players after you died.
Fixed bug: Granite maul special attack.
Fixed bug: Wilderness skull not disappearing after leaving wilderness.
Fixed bug: NPC drops.
Fixed bug: Wilderness levels in duel arena.
Fixed bug: Client crashing.
Removed: Lunar interface.
Increased Stability; Uses 3x less CPU now.
Handled all packets.
Handled NPC combat.
Fixed logging in glitch.
Removed a lot of unnecessary codes.
Desert treasure quest: Almost completed.
Lost City Quest: Started.

Based in Edgeville.
PvN magic.
Handled Minigames.
Finished: Barrows.
Finished: Warriors guild.
Shops in edgeville include: Crafting shop (Craft leather and D’ Hide items here; Only way to get D’ hide items), General store, Herblore shop (Ingredients to make the potions), Slayer Master/shop (Get a slayer task here), Rune shop, Ranged shop (This will include bows up to maple, and arrows up to adamant and other items), General PKing items, such as rune armour, dragon weapons (Abyssal whip will be obtained from slayer, and other items will have to be gained etc), Skillcape shop.

Crafting added. Includes leather crafting, gem cutting, amulet creation etc.
Herblore added: Most potions added.
Fishing added.
Cooking added, with Cook 1, 5, X.
Fletching added: For fletching higher level bows, and rune arrows etc.

Full skulling added: You attack someone, you skull; they attack you back, they don’t skull. You also lose all items if you are skulled and you don’t have protect item on, if you die.
Dueling handled, and fixed up.
More use of events, and less ‘processing’ used.

I may or may not post a development thread for all this, and more to come.
I am debating on whether to integrate with my forums, you may discuss this.

There’s quite a bit more, I just haven’t noted it down, therefore I cannot remember it .[/quote]

Read full topic
